title: Ep. 97 - Field Of Dreams
description: A lot of Kevin Costner talk in this episode because he's awesome. The boys tried to solve the mystery of Todd's missing lunch, Todd told a story about someone breaking into his house (or did they?), and they answered some fantastic listener questions then ended on a football-themed segment of Friday Bangerz.
